    • Uses of Image in edu.cs495.engine.gfx

      Methods in edu.cs495.engine.gfx with parameters of type Image 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Renderer.draw(Image image, int offX, int offY)
      (Draw is an overloaded method and has many implementations) This draw method will create an ImageRequest and add it to the list of render requests.
      void Renderer.draw(Image image, int renderOrder, int offX, int offY)
      (Draw is an overloaded method and has many implementations) This draw method will create an ImageRequest with a specific render order and add it to the list of render requests.
      void Renderer.drawOverlay(Image image, int renderOrder, int x, int y)
      (DrawOverlay is an overloaded method and has many implementations) This draw method will create an OverlayRequest from an Image and add it to the list of OverlayRequests.
      void Renderer.setMap(Image image)
      Sets the background image
